sentences.en: He chewed over a vexatious problem of personnel.
sentences.cn: 他思考着伤脑筋的人事问题.

sentences.en: He got an injunction against vexatious litigation by his enemies.
sentences.cn: 他由于敌人的诬告而被法庭下达了一项禁令.

sentences.en: How vexatious to miss one's train!
I face the vexatious, you no longer just smile.
sentences.cn: 面对我的无理取闹, 你不再只是笑笑.

sentences.en: In fact you are aware that this is your somewhat vexatious.
sentences.cn: 事实上你也清楚,这次是你有点无理取闹.

sentences.en: Moving house is a vexatious business.
